attributes.action: Legalise pepper spray to allow people to protect themselves from attacks
attributes.additional_details: Terror and knife attacks are becoming the new normal in the United Kingdom. The public currently have no means to protect themselves from these attacks. Legalising this would at least give people a fighting chance to defend themselves.
attributes.background: Pepper spray should be legalised to allow people to defend themselves in public.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise pepper spray in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742673
